title.rendered: Eldorado Outdoor™ Featured in Architectural Record Magazine

content.rendered: Architects continually strive to incorporate sustainable practices in their designs. Architectural Record used the July issue to discuss the importance of green design sensitivity, while highlighting products with sustainable features, like Eldorado Outdoor and Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds. It also gave architects a chance to earn required continuing education credits.

excerpt.rendered: Architects continually strive to incorporate sustainable practices in their designs. Architectural Record used the July issue to discuss the importance of green design sensitivity, while highlighting products with sustainable features, like Eldorado Outdoor and Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds. It also gave architects a chance to earn required continuing education credits.
